titles.title: A bill for the relief of Jim K. Yoshida.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary: 1/24/2005--Introduced. Deems Jim K. Yoshida to be a veteran for purposes of all laws administered by the Secretary of Veterans Affairs. Deems his service as a volunteer member of the U.S. Army during a specified period to be active military service from which he was discharged under honorable conditions.
